__e: That's the best thing a girl can be in this world, a beautiful little fool.
You think I'm an alte kliatshe and don't know what you're doing? !
And she's a fool, and you need to go there and tell her that I told you to say that dating... is evil, and that what the two of you have is rare, and... and that she's an idiot.
Why, that is the silliest thing i ever heard.
Don't get some silly idea that I was responsible for what happened to him.
And for what... a foolish girl who doesn't know her place?
But wouldn't I be foolish, now, to do everything men told me to do?
You are a fool if you think you can hold me forever.
I was foolish to think that anything I could do would keep my children from danger.
You fool, why did you have to make such a good job of it?
No, I think she was foolish to wait so long.
Why, I'd be a fool to give that up for you.
You probably think I'm a fool but I always wanted to change my life. And yours.
No,you're not silly,but,just... don't you think if it was really your time to go, that maybe you'd get some kind of a heads up from the universe?
Pops, I know I'm a fool but if I tell you something, you won't think I'm silly, will you?
